p: The UPLC analysis was performed with a Waters ACQUITY UPLC HSS T3 C18 column (1.8 µm, 2.1 mm × 100 mm). The solvent system was 0.04% acetic acid in water (mobile phase A) and 0.04% acetic acid in acetonitrile (mobile phase B). Oven temperature was set to 40 °C, and a flow rate of 0.40 mL/min was used. The A:B ( v: v) gradient program was as follows: 100:0 ( v: v) at 0 min, 5:95 ( v: v) at 11.0 min, 5:95 ( v: v) at 12.0 min, 95:5 ( v: v) at 12.1 min, 95:5 ( v: v) at 15.0 min. The effluent was alternatively connected to an ESI-triple quadrupole-linear ion trap (Q TRAP)-MS after UPLC [ 23, 49].
